attributes.action: Allow Driving Tests to go forward during the Lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Because some young individuals need there driving licence for work, like myself, i work for Travis Perkins so i need my driving licence in order to travel to and from work without getting lifts from other people.
attributes.background: Allow candidates to continue with there driving tests, as it is a necessity for some people.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
